column2: but was it worth the wait? I polled our 9 guests after we waited 2 hours for a table. We tried thin crust
column4: veggie and cheese. Everyone said yes
column5: worth the wait to check the box that they have been here and tried it
column7: they would not come back on their next trip to Chicago. It was good
column8: but not life changing. We had a great time and our waitress was amazing. If you can have Laura
column11: say hello to the traveler next to you (because no one in here is a local) and enjoy your pizza.
